headline.main: AP PHOTOS: Storms Cause Damage Across Tornado Alley
headline.print_headline: AP PHOTOS: Storms Cause Damage Across Tornado Alley

docs.snippet: Many residents across the southern Plains were left to riffle through their rubble after violent weather struck Tornado Alley....
docs.lead_paragraph: Many residents across the southern Plains were left to riffle through their rubble after violent weather struck Tornado Alley.

headline.main: Mayweather to Showtime: Pacquiao a 'Sore Loser' and 'Coward'
headline.print_headline: Mayweather to Showtime: Pacquiao a 'Sore Loser' and 'Coward'

docs.snippet: Floyd Mayweather says in an upcoming interview with Showtime that at this moment he's not interested in a rematch with Manny Pacquiao "because he's a sore loser and he's a coward."...
docs.lead_paragraph: Floyd Mayweather says in an upcoming interview with Showtime that at this moment he's not interested in a rematch with Manny Pacquiao "because he's a sore loser and he's a coward."

headline.main: Poetry Readings Removed From Atlantic City's Summer Plans
headline.print_headline: Poetry Readings Removed From Atlantic City's Summer Plans

docs.snippet: Poetry has been sent packing from Atlantic City's summer entertainment offerings after complaints it would be a waste of money....
docs.lead_paragraph: Poetry has been sent packing from Atlantic City's summer entertainment offerings after complaints it would be a waste of money.

headline.main: American Becomes 2nd US Airline to Use Boeing's 787
headline.print_headline: American Becomes 2nd US Airline to Use Boeing's 787

docs.snippet: American has joined the list of airlines flying the Boeing 787 jet, which it hopes will appeal to passengers and open new, profitable international routes....
docs.lead_paragraph: American has joined the list of airlines flying the Boeing 787 jet, which it hopes will appeal to passengers and open new, profitable international routes.

headline.main: Officials Suspect Short Circuit in Rome Airport Fire
headline.print_headline: Officials Suspect Short Circuit in Rome Airport Fire

docs.snippet: An electrical short circuit is being investigated as the probable cause of a fire in the international terminal at Rome's Fiumicino airport that forced the cancellation of dozens of flights, authorities said Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: An electrical short circuit is being investigated as the probable cause of a fire in the international terminal at Rome's Fiumicino airport that forced the cancellation of dozens of flights, authorities said Thursday.

headline.main: North American Tour Planned for 'Curious Incident'
headline.print_headline: North American Tour Planned for 'Curious Incident'

docs.snippet: A North American tour of the London import "The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time" is being planned for next year....
docs.lead_paragraph: A North American tour of the London import "The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time" is being planned for next year.

headline.main: California Court Sides With Consumers in Generic Drug Fight
headline.print_headline: California Court Sides With Consumers in Generic Drug Fight

docs.snippet: In a win for consumers, the California Supreme Court ruled Thursday that settlement agreements between pharmaceutical companies that keep cheaper, generic drugs off the market may be illegal if they include excessive cash payments....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a win for consumers, the California Supreme Court ruled Thursday that settlement agreements between pharmaceutical companies that keep cheaper, generic drugs off the market may be illegal if they include excessive cash payments.

headline.main: Defending Champion Schedule Keeping Pagenaud Busy at Indy
headline.print_headline: Defending Champion Schedule Keeping Pagenaud Busy at Indy

docs.snippet: Simon Pagenaud was eager to start driving Thursday....

headline.main: New Orleans Pushes for New Tax to Make French Quarter Safer
headline.print_headline: New Orleans Pushes for New Tax to Make French Quarter Safer

docs.snippet: Following a rash of crime in the French Quarter — the city's historic jewel and prime tourism destination — city leaders are pushing ahead with a plan to raise $2 million a year to fund policing in the busy tourism district....
docs.lead_paragraph: Following a rash of crime in the French Quarter — the city's historic jewel and prime tourism destination — city leaders are pushing ahead with a plan to raise $2 million a year to fund policing in the busy tourism district.

headline.main: Smithsonian's Black History Museum on Track for 2016 Opening
headline.print_headline: Smithsonian's Black History Museum on Track for 2016 Opening

docs.snippet: With a bronze metal and glass structure taking shape on the National Mall, the Smithsonian Institution said Thursday that its new National Museum of African American History and Culture is on track to open in 2016....
docs.lead_paragraph: With a bronze metal and glass structure taking shape on the National Mall, the Smithsonian Institution said Thursday that its new National Museum of African American History and Culture is on track to open in 2016.
